projects.title: Smart Garden Monitor
projects.description: A battery-powered IoT device that monitors soil moisture, temperature, and light levels. Features ultra-low power design with solar charging and LoRa connectivity for remote monitoring.
projects.fullDescription: This comprehensive IoT solution combines multiple sensors with efficient power management to create a fully autonomous garden monitoring system. The device features custom PCB design with integrated solar charging, ultra-low power microcontroller programming, and long-range wireless communication via LoRa technology. The system can operate for months without maintenance while providing real-time data to farmers and gardening enthusiasts.

projects.title: Audio-Reactive Light Installation
projects.description: Interactive lighting installation that responds to music in real-time. Custom PCB design with high-speed audio processing and 1000+ individually addressable LEDs.
projects.fullDescription: A large-scale interactive art installation featuring over 1000 individually addressable LEDs that respond to music in real-time. The system performs real-time FFT analysis to extract frequency components and creates stunning visual representations of audio. Custom hardware design ensures minimal latency and maximum visual impact for live performances and events.

projects.title: Wireless Sensor Network
projects.description: Self-healing mesh network of environmental sensors. Each node can operate independently while contributing to collective data gathering and network resilience.
projects.fullDescription: An advanced mesh networking solution that creates resilient networks of environmental sensors. Each node in the network can route data through neighboring nodes, creating redundancy and ensuring data reaches its destination even if individual nodes fail. The system automatically discovers optimal routing paths and adapts to changing network topology.
